div.p: Dismiss Octotip: You've activated the file finder by pressing t Start typing to filter the file list. Use ↑ and ↓ to navigate, enter to view files.

a.class: minibutton bigger switcher js-menu-target js-commitish-button btn-branch repo-tree

div.class: commitish-item branch-commitish selector-item js-navigation-item js-navigation-target selected

a.class: grouped-button file-edit-link minibutton bigger lighter js-rewrite-sha

pre.div: <visible>Skin.HasSetting(numitems.enable) + [Window.IsActive(programs) | Window.IsActive(pictures) | Window.IsActive(musiclibrary) | Window.IsActive(musicfiles) | Window.IsActive(videolibrary) | Window.IsActive(videoplaylist) | Window.IsActive(addonbrowser) | Window.IsActive(musicplaylist)] + ![Window.IsActive(movieinformation) | Window.IsActive(musicinformation) | Window.IsActive(script-globalsearch-main.xml) | Window.IsActive(3000)]</visible>

<visible>!Window.IsActive(busydialog) + Skin.HasSetting(indicator.enable) + !Skin.HasSetting(global.kiosk) + [Window.IsActive(programs) | Window.IsActive(weather) | Window.IsActive(musicplaylist) | Window.IsActive(videoplaylist) | Window.IsActive(addonbrowser) | Window.IsActive(videolibrary) | Window.IsActive(musiclibrary) | Window.IsActive(musicfiles) | Window.IsActive(pictures) | Window.IsActive(600)] + !Control.IsVisible(9900)</visible>

<visible>[Control.IsVisible(50) | Control.IsVisible(51) | Control.IsVisible(54) | Control.IsVisible(541) | Control.IsVisible(57) | Control.IsVisible(571) | Control.IsVisible(572) | Control.IsVisible(573) | Control.IsVisible(574) | Control.IsVisible(575) | Control.IsVisible(576) | Window.IsActive(weather) | Window.IsActive(600)] + ![Window.IsActive(movieinformation) | Window.IsActive(musicinformation) | Window.IsActive(3000)]</visible>

div.span: <animation effect="rotate" center="auto" start="0" end="-180" time="250" tween="Quadratic" condition="ControlGroup(6000).HasFocus">Conditional</animation>

pre.div: <visible>[Container.Content(movies) | Container.Content(episodes)] + ListItem.IsResumable + Skin.HasSetting(overlay.resumable) + IsEmpty(ListItem.Property(ReleaseDate) + !SubString(Container.FolderPath,special://skin/playlists/Movies In Progress.xsp)</visible>

div.span: <!--adjust in pvr and weather+, then remove-->

pre.div: <animation effect="slide" start="0,0" end="0,42" time="0" condition="Player.HasAudio | VideoPlayer.Content(musicvideos) | VideoPlayer.Content(files)">Conditional</animation>

<visible>[Window.IsVisible(fullscreenvideo) | Window.IsActive(visualisation)] + ![[Window.IsActive(seekbar) + Skin.HasSetting(osd.progressbar)] | [Window.IsActive(visualisationpresetlist) | Window.IsActive(videoosd) | Window.IsVisible(bookmarks) | Window.IsVisible(PVROSDChannels) | Window.IsVisible(PVROSDGuide) | Window.IsActive(script-XBMC_Lyrics-main.xml)]]</visible>
<animation effect="slide" start="0,0" end="0,-44" time="0" condition="Player.HasAudio | VideoPlayer.Content(musicvideos) | VideoPlayer.Content(files)">Conditional</animation>

div.pre: # This is an <h1> tag ## This is an <h2> tag ###### This is an <h6> tag

*This text will be italic* _This will also be italic_ **This text will be bold** __This will also be bold__
*You **can** combine them*

As Kanye West said:
> We're living the future so > the present is our past.
I think you should use an `<addr>` element here instead.
